quote: She started dialing his cell, then hung up and tried the landline -- maybe Margaret was a better bet to pick up; their parents' generation still felt morally obligated to answer phones.
quote_letters: SHE STARTED DIALING HIS CELL THEN HUNG UP AND TRIED THE LANDLINE -- MAYBE MARGARET WAS A BETTER BET TO PICK UP THEIR PARENTS GENERATION STILL FELT MORALLY OBLIGATED TO ANSWER PHONES
